segments.text: You too . Have you lost some weight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I took off 4 kilos . I am glad you notice it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not some crazy diet fat I hope .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No no , I just changed my eating habits . I eat a balance meal . and I eat less than before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good for you , keep it up .
segments.speaker: S2
